member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases
member.summary:
Contains functionality for creating issue reports in any text based format (HTML, Markdown, ...).
NOTE: Use Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic addin to use these aliases with Cake Script Runners and Cake.Frosting.Issues.Reporting.Generic to use these aliases with Cake Frosting.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases.GenericIssueReportFormatFromEmbeddedTemplate(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplate)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using an embedded template.
member.param: The context.
Template to use for generating the report.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

example.para: Create HTML report using the diagnostic template:

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases.GenericIssueReportFormatFromEmbeddedTemplate(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplate,System.Action{Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatSettings})
member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using an embedded template with custom settings.
member.param: The context.
Template to use for generating the report.
Action for defining the settings.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

example.para: Create HTML report using the HtmlDxDataGrid template with custom title:
example.code: CreateIssueReport( issues, GenericIssueReportFormatFromEmbeddedTemplate( GenericIssueReportTemplate.HtmlDxDataGrid, x => x.WithOption(HtmlDxDataGridOption.Title, "My Issue Report")), @"c:\repo", @"c:\report.html");

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases.GenericIssueReportFormatFromFilePath(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using a local template.
member.param: The context.
Path to the template to use for generating the report.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

example.para: Create HTML report from local template file:

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases.GenericIssueReportFormatFromFilePath(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Action{Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatSettings})
member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using a local template with custom settings.
member.param: The context.
Path to the template to use for generating the report.
Action for defining the settings.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

example.para: Create HTML report from local template file with custom title:
example.code: CreateIssueReport( issues, GenericIssueReportFormatFromFilePath( @"c:\ReportTemplate.cshtml", x => x.WithOption("Title", "My Issue Report")), @"c:\repo", @"c:\report.html");

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases.GenericIssueReportFormatFromContent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using a template string.
member.param: The context.
Content of the template to use for generating the report.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

example.para: Create HTML report from a template string:
example.code:
template = "
    @foreach(var issue in Model){
  • @issue.Message
    • }
"; CreateIssueReport( issues, GenericIssueReportFormatFromContent(template), @"c:\repo", @"c:\report.html");

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatAliases.GenericIssueReportFormatFromContent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.Action{Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportFormatSettings})
member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using a template string with custom settings.
member.param: The context.
Content of the template to use for generating the report.
Action for defining the settings.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

example.para: Create HTML report from a template string with custom title:
example.code:
template = "

@ViewBag.Title

    @foreach(var issue in Model){
  • @issue.Message
    • }
"; CreateIssueReport( issues, GenericIssueReportFormatFromContent( template, x => x.WithOption("Title", "My Issue Report")), @"c:\repo", @"c:\report.html");

member.summary: Gets an instance of the generic report format using specified settings.
member.param: The context.
Settings for reading the MSBuild log.
member.returns: Instance of the generic report format.

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplate
member.summary: Default templates provided by this addin.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplate.HtmlDiagnostic
member.summary: Template for an HTML report containing a list of all issues with all properties.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplate.HtmlDataTable
member.summary: Template for an HTML report containing a rich data table view with sorting and search functionality.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplate.HtmlDxDataGrid
member.summary: Template for an HTML report containing a rich data grid with sorting, filtering, grouping and search capabilities. See for template specific options.

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.GenericIssueReportTemplateExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for enumeration.

member.summary: Returns the name of the embedded template file.
member.param: Template for which the embedded file name should be returned.
member.returns: Name of the template file.

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription
member.summary: Description of a column in the template.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.#ctor(System.String,System.Func{Cake.Issues.IIssue,System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: ID of the column.
Function for retrieving the value of the column.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the column.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.ValueRetriever
member.summary: Gets a function for retrieving the value of the column.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption of the column.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.VisibleIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the column regarding other columns. See for values of default columns. Default value is zero, which means that the column will be added before any default columns.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.AllowFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data can be filtered by this column or not. Applies only if is set. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.AllowGrouping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can group data by values of this column or not. Applies only if is set. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridColumnDescription.AllowSorting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can sort rows by this column at runtime or not. Default value is true.

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridDisplayMode
member.summary: Available display modes for template.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridDisplayMode.Paged
member.summary: Issues are displayed in pages with a pager in the footer.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridDisplayMode.InfiniteScroll
member.summary: More issues are loaded when the user reaches the end of the grid.

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridExportFormat
member.summary: Available export formats for template.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridExportFormat.Excel
member.summary: Microsoft Excel (*.xlsx).

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridExportFormat.Pdf
member.summary: Portable Document Format (*.pdf).

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption
member.summary: Options for the template.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.Title
member.summary: Title of the report. Default value is Issues Report.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.Theme
member.summary: DevExtreme theme to use. See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ShowHeader
member.summary: Flag if the title should be shown as header on the top of the page. Either true or false. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.EnableSearching
member.summary: Flag if the search panel for full text searching should be visible or not. Either true or false. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.EnableGrouping
member.summary: Flag if the group panel which allows end-user grouping should be visible or not. Either true or false. If false grouping defined by is still applied. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.EnableFiltering
member.summary: Flag if filtering should be available or not. Either true or false. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ProviderTypeVisible
member.summary: Flag if the column should be visible or not. Either true or false. Default value is false.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ProviderTypeSortOrder
member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ProviderNameVisible
member.summary: Flag if the column should be visible or not. Either true or false. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ProviderNameSortOrder
member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.RunVisible
member.summary: Flag if the column should be visible or not. Either true or false. Default value is true if any issue contains run information, otherwise false.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.RunSortOrder
member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.PriorityVisible
member.summary: Flag if the column should be visible or not. Either true or false. Default value is false.

member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.summary: Flag if the column should be visible or not. Either true or false. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.MessageSortOrder
member.summary: Sort order of the column if it is part of . See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.GroupedColumns
member.summary: List of which should be grouped. Grouped columns are always visible. Default value is and .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.SortedColumns
member.summary: List of which should be sorted. Default value is , , , , .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.AdditionalColumns
member.summary: List of for additional columns which should be added to the grid. Default value is an empty list.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.JQueryLocation
member.summary:
Location where jQuery can be found. The following files need to be available:
{JQueryLocation}/jquery-{JQueryVersion}.min.js
Default value is https://ajax.aspnetcdn.com/ajax/jquery/.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.JQueryVersion
member.summary: Version of jQuery which should be used. This version needs to match the version required by the selected . Default value is 3.7.1.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.DevExtremeLocation
member.summary:
Location where the DevExtreme libraries can be found. Below the location there needs to be a folder matching and inside there subfolders js and css. The following files need to be available:
{DevExtremeLocation}/{DevExtremeVersion}/js/dx.all.js
{DevExtremeLocation}/{DevExtremeVersion}/css/dx.common.css
{DevExtremeLocation}/{DevExtremeVersion}/css/{Theme}
Default value is https://cdn3.devexpress.com/jslib/.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.DevExtremeVersion
member.summary: Version of the DevExtreme libraries which should be used. If setting this the matching needs to also be set. Default value is 23.1.13.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.DevExtremeLicenseKey
member.summary: License key for DevExtreme. Required for version 23.2 and later. Default value is null.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.IdeIntegrationSettings
member.summary: Settings for having functionality to open files affected by issues in IDEs. Value needs to be an instance of . Default value is null.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.EnableExporting
member.summary: Flag if exporting should be available or not. Either true or false. Default value is false.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ExportFileName
member.summary: Default name of the export file without file name extension. Default value is issue-report.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ExportFormat
member.summary: Export format. See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ExcelJsLocation
member.summary:
Location where ExcelJS can be found. Below the location there needs to be a folder matching . The following files need to be available:
{ExcelJsLocation}/{ExcelJsVersion}/exceljs.min.js
Default value is https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/exceljs/.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ExcelJsVersion
member.summary: Version of ExcelJS which should be used. This version needs to match the version required by the selected . Default value is 4.4.0.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.FileSaverJsLocation
member.summary:
Location where FileSaver.js can be found. Below the location there needs to be a folder matching . The following files need to be available:

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.FileSaverJsVersion
member.summary: Version of FileSaver.js which should be used. This version needs to match the version required by the selected . Default value is 2.0.5.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.JsPdfLocation

Location where jsPDF can be found. Below the location there needs to be a folder matching . The following files need to be available:

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.JsPdfVersion
member.summary: Version of jsPDF which should be used. This version needs to match the version required by the selected . Default value is 3.0.1.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.JsPdfAutotableLocation
member.summary:
Location where jsPDF-AutoTable plugin can be found. Below the location there needs to be a folder matching . The following files need to be available:

Default value is https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jspdf-autotable/.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.JsPdfAutotableVersion
member.summary: Version of jsPDF-AutoTable plugin which should be used. This version needs to match the version required by the selected . Default value is 5.0.2.

member.summary: Display mode of the grid. See for possible values. Default value is .

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.ShowColumnChooser

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.PersistState
member.summary: Flag if customization in the report should be persisted. Either true or false. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.HtmlDxDataGridOption.StorageKey
member.summary: Key for the state storage. Reports with the same key will share customizations. Default value is CakeIssuesReportingGeneric.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Generic.StringExtensions.SanitizeHtmlIdRegEx
member.remarks:
Pattern:
/^[^a-z]+|[^\\w:-]+
Explanation:
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match '/'.
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match a character in the set [^a-z] atomically at least once.
Match a character in the set [^-:\w] atomically at least once.
